Package org.apache.juneau.examples.rest

Class RequestEchoResource

java.lang.Object
org.apache.juneau.rest.servlet.RestObject
org.apache.juneau.rest.servlet.BasicRestObject
org.apache.juneau.examples.rest.RequestEchoResource
All Implemented Interfaces:
BasicUniversalConfig, DefaultConfig, DefaultHtmlConfig, BasicRestOperations
@Bean(on="HttpServletRequest",interfaceClass=jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest.class) @Bean(on="HttpSession",interfaceClass=jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession.class) @Bean(on="ServletContext",interfaceClass=jakarta.servlet.ServletContext.class) public class RequestEchoResource extends BasicRestObject
Sample REST resource for echoing HttpServletRequests back to the browser.
